00040 /**
00041  * @file
00042  *
00043  * This file provides reader/writer locks.
00044  *
00045  * <hr>$Revision: 73845 $<hr>
00046  *
00047  *
00048  */
00049 
00050 #ifndef __CVMX_RWLOCK_H__
00051 #define __CVMX_RWLOCK_H__
00052 
00053 /* include to get atomic compare and store */
00054 #include "cvmx-atomic.h"
00055 
00056 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00057 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00058 extern "C" {
00059 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00060 #endif
00061 
00062 /* Flags for lock value in rw lock structure */
00063 #define CVMX_RWLOCK_WRITE_FLAG     0x1
00064 #define CVMX_RWLOCK_READ_INC       0x2
00065 
00066 /* Writer preference locks (wp).  Can be starved by writers.  When a writer
00067  * is waiting, no readers are given the lock until all writers are done.
00068  */
00069 typedef struct {
00070     volatile uint32_t lock;
00071     volatile uint32_t write_req;
00072     volatile uint32_t write_comp;
00073 } cvmx_rwlock_wp_lock_t;
00074 
00075 /**
00076  * Initialize a reader/writer lock.  This must be done
00077  * by a single core before used.
00078  *
00079  * @param lock   pointer to rwlock structure
00080  */
00081 static inline void cvmx_rwlock_wp_init(cvmx_rwlock_wp_lock_t * lock)
00082 {
00083     lock->lock = 0;
00084     lock->write_req = 0;
00085     lock->write_comp = 0;
00086 }
00087 
00088 /**
00089  * Perform a reader lock.  If a writer is pending, this
00090  * will wait for that writer to complete before locking.
00091  *
00092  * NOTE: Each thread/process must only lock any rwlock
00093  * once, or else a deadlock may result.
00094  *
00095  * @param lock   pointer to rwlock structure
00096  */ static inline void cvmx_rwlock_wp_read_lock(cvmx_rwlock_wp_lock_t * lock)
00097 {
00098 
00099     /* Wait for outstanding write requests to be serviced */
00100     while (lock->write_req != lock->write_comp) ;
00101     /* Add ourselves to interested reader count */
00102     cvmx_atomic_add32_nosync((int32_t *) & (lock->lock), CVMX_RWLOCK_READ_INC);
00103     /* Wait for writer to finish.  No writer will start again
00104      ** until after we are done since we have already incremented
00105      ** the reader count
00106      */
00107     while (lock->lock & CVMX_RWLOCK_WRITE_FLAG) ;
00108 
00109 }
00110 
00111 /**
00112  * Perform a reader unlock.
00113  *
00114  * @param lock   pointer to rwlock structure
00115  */
00116 static inline void cvmx_rwlock_wp_read_unlock(cvmx_rwlock_wp_lock_t * lock)
00117 {
00118     /* Remove ourselves to reader count */
00119     cvmx_atomic_add32_nosync((int32_t *) & (lock->lock), -CVMX_RWLOCK_READ_INC);
00120 }
00121 
00122 /**
00123  * Perform a writer lock.  Any readers that attempt
00124  * to get a lock while there are any pending write locks
00125  * will wait until all writers have completed.  Starvation
00126  * of readers by writers is possible and must be avoided
00127  * by the application.
00128  *
00129  * @param lock   pointer to rwlock structure
00130  */
00131 static inline void cvmx_rwlock_wp_write_lock(cvmx_rwlock_wp_lock_t * lock)
00132 {
00133     /* Get previous value of write requests */
00134     uint32_t prev_writers = ((uint32_t) cvmx_atomic_fetch_and_add32((int32_t *) & (lock->write_req), 1));
00135     /* Spin until our turn */
00136     while (prev_writers != lock->write_comp) ;
00137     /* Spin until no other readers or writers, then set write flag */
00138     while (!cvmx_atomic_compare_and_store32((uint32_t *) & (lock->lock), 0, CVMX_RWLOCK_WRITE_FLAG)) ;
00139 
00140 }
00141 
00142 /**
00143  * Perform a writer unlock.
00144  *
00145  * @param lock   pointer to rwlock structure
00146  */
00147 static inline void cvmx_rwlock_wp_write_unlock(cvmx_rwlock_wp_lock_t * lock)
00148 {
00149     /* Remove our writer flag */
00150     CVMX_SYNCWS;        /* Make sure all writes in protected region are visible before unlock */
00151     cvmx_atomic_add32_nosync((int32_t *) & (lock->lock), -CVMX_RWLOCK_WRITE_FLAG);
00152     cvmx_atomic_add32_nosync((int32_t *) & (lock->write_comp), 1);
00153     CVMX_SYNCWS;        /* push unlock writes out, but don't stall */
00154 }
00155 
00156 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00157 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00158 }
00159 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00160 #endif
00161 
00162 #endif /* __CVMX_RWLOCK_H__ */
